text: The Subcommittee on National Security, the Border and Foreign Affairs is a subcommittee of the United States House Committee on Oversight and Accountability. They focus on national security, homeland security, and foreign policy. It was created again and expanded during the 112th Congress by full committee chairman Darrell Issa. During Democratic control from 2019 to 2023, it was known as the Subcommittee on National Security. ==References== Oversight National Security
title:
United States House Oversight Subcommittee on National Security, the Border
and Foreign Affairs
